title: Open Beta Test is Live!
announcement: PLAY3 Open Beta Test is LIVE!
description:
The moment you've been waiting for is finally here!
 Following the successful run of our Private Testnet, the PLAY3 Open Beta Test (OBT) has officially launched!

 Key Features:
 [Missions and Rewards]
 Complete diverse missions, including ongoing collaboration events, to earn generous rewards.

 [Personal Shop]
 Open your own shop to freely buy and sell NFTs you've created or acquired.

 [Meme Coin Farm]
 Create and grow unique meme coins with your ideas and community.

 [NFT Creation]
 Unleash your creativity and craft your very own masterpieces.

 [Customize Your Unique Character]
 Acquire special costumes via shops and events, then customize your character however you like!

 We'll be keeping a close eye on PLAY3 as it evolves, and we welcome your feedback.
 Let's make this experience even better together!

 Enjoy exploring our Open Beta Test!

title: Oasd
description:
<Announcement > General 공지문 #1>
제목 : 📢 [Pre-Registration Reward Notice]
본문 : 
Hello, PLAYERS! 👋
Welcome to PLAY3 — your friendly, mission-powered gateway to Web3.

Thanks a ton to everyone who pre-registered and joined our Telegram quest.
You’re awesome — now grab what’s yours!  👇

🔹 [Ended] Pre-Reigstration Event
Pre-registered? This is yours:
  ⦁ 1 Special NFT Costume Set (EVENT Grade)
  ⦁ 10,000 Copper

📥 How to claim:
★ Sign up with the same email you used to pre-register.
Head to your Inbox on PLAY3; your rewards are ready to claim!

--------------------------------------------------

🔹 [OnGoging] Telegram Quest Event
Here’s what’s up for grabs:
  ⦁ Limited NFT Costume Set
  ⦁ Extra Copper (based on contribution)
  ⦁ Stardust (based on contribution)

✅ How it works:
The quest is still live! Once it’s over, 
we’ll check everyone’s contribution 
and drop your final rewards straight to your Inbox.

✨ P.S. Stardust = future perks 😉
Hold onto it!

--------------------------------------------------

🏃‍♂️ More Rewards Are Waiting!
Don’t miss our Grand Open Events.
Even more rewards are ready to grab!
👉 Check the [Grand Beta Open Events] post for all the details!
  * Announcement > Event > [Grand Beta Open Events]

Let’s PLAY3! 👾
See you in the square!
